Package com.github.egyptian_league.json.src

Class JsonArray

java.lang.Object
com.github.egyptian_league.json.src.JsonElement
com.github.egyptian_league.json.src.JsonArray
All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterable<JsonElement>
public class JsonArray extends JsonElement implements Iterable<JsonElement>
Container to hold JSON array.

      public boolean removeAll(Collection<?> elements)

      Parameters:
      elements - - collection containing elements to be removed from this list
      Returns:
      true if this JSON array changed as a result of the call

    • removeIf

      public boolean removeIf(Predicate<? super JsonElement> filter)
      Removes all of the elements of this JSON array that satisfy the given predicate.
      Parameters:
      filter - a predicate which returns true for elements to be removed
      Returns:
      true if any elements were removed
